summary.span: 取得或設定遠端應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a remoting application.
The name of a remoting application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過目前的屬性，或是透過組態檔，可以一次，設定應用程式名稱。An application name can be set only once, either through the current property or through a configuration file. 如果應用程式正在執行在裝載環境，例如網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 中，這個值可能會有已設定 （通常是以虛擬目錄中）。If an application is running inside a hosted environment, such as Internet Information Services (IIS), this value might have already been set (usually to the virtual directory). 目前的屬性會傳回`null`如果尚未設定應用程式名稱。The current property will return `null` if the application name has not been set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性以表示遠端處理應用程式的名稱。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to indicate the name of the remoting application. 完整範例程式碼，請參閱範例和方法。For the full example code, see examples for the and methods. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/VB/server.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取遠端物件的具名的應用程式。The following code example demonstrates how to access an object remoted from a named application. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CPP/client.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/CS/client.cs#6)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ServerActivation1/VB/client.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 已經過時。 is obsolete. 請改用 。Please use instead. 傳遞`null`做為`filename`參數會導致遠端執行功能的預設初始化，而不需要組態檔是否存在。Passing `null` as the `filename` parameter will cause default remoting initialization without requiring the existence of a configuration file. 如需組態檔語法，請參閱[遠端設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e)。For configuration file syntax, see [Remoting Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e). > [!NOTE] > 傳址方式封送處理物件 (Mbr) 不永遠位於記憶體中。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反地，除非類型覆寫若要控制它自己的存留期原則，每個 MBR 具有有限的存留期之前的.NET Framework 遠端處理系統開始刪除它，並回收記憶體的程序。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 存留期租用期](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a). ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/CPP/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/CS/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration_Configure_Client/VB/remotingconfiguration_configure_server.vb#1)]

summary.span: 讀取組態檔，並設定遠端基礎結構。

span.span: Reads the configuration file and configures the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞`null`做為`filename`參數會導致遠端執行功能的預設初始化，而不需要組態檔是否存在。Passing `null` as the `filename` parameter will cause default remoting initialization without requiring the existence of a configuration file. 如需遠端處理和安全性詳細資訊，請參閱[遠端處理中的安全性。](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add)For more information about remoting and security see [Security in Remoting.](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add) 如需組態檔語法，請參閱[遠端設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e)。For configuration file syntax, see [Remoting Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e). > [!NOTE] > 傳址方式封送處理物件 (Mbr) 不永遠位於記憶體中。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反地，除非類型覆寫若要控制它自己的存留期原則，每個 MBR 具有有限的存留期之前的.NET Framework 遠端處理系統開始刪除它，並回收記憶體的程序。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 存留期租用期](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c72d561c-1266-4c8b-b258-2c168c08da9a).

summary.span: 指示這個應用程式定義域中的伺服器通道是否會將篩選過或完整的例外狀況資訊，傳回至本機或遠端的呼叫端。

span.span: Indicates whether the server channels in this application domain return filtered or complete exception information to local or remote callers.

returns.span: 如果僅將篩選的例外狀況資訊傳回至本機或遠端呼叫端，則為 ，正如 參數所指定的，如果傳回完整的例外狀況資訊，則為 。

span.span: if only filtered exception information is returned to local or remote callers, as specified by the parameter; if complete exception information is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完整的例外狀況資訊包括確切的伺服器例外狀況和伺服器堆疊追蹤。Complete exception information includes the exact server exception and the server stack trace. 篩選過的資訊包括標準的遠端例外狀況，但不包括伺服器堆疊追蹤。Filtered information includes a standard remoting exception but no server stack trace. `CustomErrorsEnabled`方法會反映中所指定的組態設定`mode`屬性``應用程式組態檔的項目。The `CustomErrorsEnabled` method reflects configuration settings that were specified in the `mode` attribute of the `` element of the application configuration file. 如需有關組態選項的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92c0c097-d984-4315-835b-7490ecdf1097)。For more information about configuration options, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92c0c097-d984-4315-835b-7490ecdf1097). 下表顯示這三種伺服器通道屬性值，指定哪個呼叫端接收例外狀況資訊，以及它們所接收的資訊類型。The following table shows the three server channel property values that specify which callers receive exception information and what type of information they receive. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`off`|所有呼叫端都接收完整的例外狀況資訊。All callers receive complete exception information.| |`on`|所有呼叫端都接收篩選過的例外狀況資訊。All callers receive filtered exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|本機呼叫端接收完整的例外狀況資訊；遠端呼叫端接收篩選過的例外狀況資訊。Local callers receive complete exception information; remote callers receive filtered exception information.| 下表顯示的互動`isLocalRequest`參數和伺服器通道屬性。The following table shows the interaction of the `isLocalRequest` parameter and the server channel property. |值Value|isLocalRequestisLocalRequest|傳回值Return value|描述Description| |-----------|--------------------|------------------|-----------------| |`on`|`true`|`true`|本機呼叫端接收篩選過的例外狀況資訊。Local callers receive filtered exception information.| |`on`|`false`|`true`|遠端呼叫端接收篩選過的例外狀況資訊。Remote callers receive filtered exception information.| |`off`|`true`|`false`|本機呼叫端都接收完整的例外狀況資訊。Local callers receive complete exception information.| |`off`|`false`|`false`|遠端呼叫端都接收完整的例外狀況資訊。Remote callers receive complete exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|`true`|`false`|本機呼叫端都接收完整的例外狀況資訊。Local callers receive complete exception information.| |`remoteOnly`|`false`|`true`|遠端呼叫端接收篩選過的例外狀況資訊。Remote callers receive filtered exception information.| 如需使用應用程式組態檔控制的例外狀況資訊傳回給呼叫者的詳細資訊，請參閱``項目。For information about using application configuration files to control the return of exception information to callers, see the `` element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在伺服器上建立用戶端啟動物件的執行個體，您必須知道其，則必須使用註冊的伺服器端上方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the server, you must know its and it must be registered on the server end by using the method. 若要取得的用戶端啟動物件的新執行個體的 proxy，用戶端必須先註冊通道，以與，然後再啟動物件，藉由呼叫`new`。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object, the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要啟動的用戶端啟動物件類型`new`關鍵字，您必須先註冊用戶端端使用的物件型別方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client end using the method. 呼叫方法提供的遠端基礎結構的遠端應用程式的位置，`new`嘗試建立它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 如果相反地，您使用方法用來建立新的執行個體的用戶端啟動物件，因此需要將用戶端上的沒有之前註冊，您必須做為參數，提供遠端應用程式的 URL。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供方法與您想要用來建立物件的伺服器 URL，您必須將封裝中的執行個體的 URL類別。To supply the method with the URL of the server where you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 用戶端啟動物件的詳細說明，請參閱 < [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a)。For a detailed description of client-activated objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在伺服器上建立用戶端啟動物件的執行個體，您必須知道其，則必須使用註冊的伺服器端上方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the server, you must know its and it must be registered on the server end by using the method. 若要取得的用戶端啟動物件的新執行個體的 proxy，用戶端必須先註冊通道，以與，然後再啟動物件，藉由呼叫`new`或。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object, the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new` or . 若要啟動的用戶端啟動物件類型`new`關鍵字，您必須先註冊用戶端端使用的物件型別方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client end using the method. 呼叫方法可讓遠端基礎結構的遠端應用程式中，位置其中`new`嘗試建立它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application, where `new` attempts to create it. 如果相反地，您使用方法用來建立新的執行個體的用戶端啟動物件，因此需要將用戶端上的沒有之前註冊，您必須做為參數，提供遠端應用程式的 URL。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供方法與您想要用來建立物件的伺服器 URL，您必須將封裝中的執行個體的 URL類別。To supply the method with the URL of the server where you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 用戶端啟動物件的詳細說明，請參閱 < [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a)。For a detailed description of client-activated objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a791494-c18a-4711-a5c1-4ab0e49a8f1a). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範在伺服器上的物件型別登錄為可以由用戶端啟動型別。The following code example demonstrates registration of an object type on the server as a type that can be activated by the client. 對應至提供的伺服器程式碼的用戶端程式碼，請參閱範例方法。For the client code that corresponds to the presented server code, see the example for the method. [!code-cpp[RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingConfiguration.ClientActivation/VB/server.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示在上述範例程式碼中註冊的服務物件。The following code example shows the service object registered in the sample code above. summary.span: 登錄記錄在用戶端上所提供 中的物件 為可在伺服器上啟動的已知型別。

span.span: Registers an object recorded in the provided on the client end as a well-known type that can be activated on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 知道已註冊的已知物件任何的 URI 用戶端可以取得物件的 proxy 註冊通道，則會使用偏好，並啟動該物件藉由呼叫`new`或。Any client that knows the URI of a registered well-known object can obtain a proxy for the object by registering the channel it prefers with , and activating the object by calling `new` or . 若要啟動的已知物件具有`new`，您必須先註冊已知物件型別，在用戶端使用方法。To activate a well-known object with `new`, you must first register the well-known object type on the client using the method. 呼叫方法可讓遠端基礎結構的遠端物件上，可讓位置`new`關鍵字來建立它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote object, which allows the `new` keyword to create it. 如果相反地，您使用方法來啟動已知物件，您必須提供它的物件 url 做為引數，因此沒有先前的登錄用戶端上需要。If, on the other hand, you use the method to activate the well-known object, you must supply it with the object's URL as an argument, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 已知物件的詳細說明，請參閱 < [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396)。For a detailed description of well-known objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396).

summary.span: 登錄記錄在服務端上所提供 中的物件 為已知型別。

span.span: Registers an object recorded in the provided on the service end as a well-known type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 知道已註冊的已知物件任何的 URI 用戶端可以取得物件的 proxy 註冊通道，則會使用偏好，並啟動該物件藉由呼叫`new`或方法。Any client that knows the URI of a registered well-known object can obtain a proxy for the object by registering the channel it prefers with , and activating the object by calling `new` or the method. 若要啟動的已知物件具有`new`，您必須先註冊已知物件型別，在用戶端使用方法。To activate a well-known object with `new`, you must first register the well-known object type on the client using the method. 呼叫方法可讓遠端基礎結構的遠端物件上，可讓位置`new`關鍵字來建立它。Calling the method gives the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote object, which allows the `new` keyword to create it. 如果相反地，您使用方法來啟動已知物件，您必須提供它的物件 url 做為引數，因此沒有先前的登錄用戶端上需要。If, on the other hand, you use the method to activate the well-known object, you must supply it with the object's URL as an argument, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 當呼叫抵達伺服器時，.NET Framework 從訊息擷取的 URI 時，會檢查遠端資料表，以找出參考之物件的比對 URI，並接著會執行個體化物件，如有必要，將方法呼叫轉送至的物件。When the call arrives at the server, the .NET Framework extracts the URI from the message, examines the remoting tables to locate the reference for the object that matches the URI, and then instantiates the object if necessary, forwarding the method call to the object. 如果物件註冊為，方法呼叫完成之後終結。If the object is registered as , it is destroyed after the method call is completed. 呼叫每一個方法被建立物件的新執行個體。A new instance of the object is created for each method called. 唯一的差別和`new`在於，前者可讓您指定的 URL 做為參數，而後者從組態取得 URL。The only difference between and `new` is that the former allows you to specify a URL as a parameter, and the latter obtains the URL from the configuration. 註冊程序未執行個體化遠端物件本身。The remote object itself is not instantiated by the registration process. 這只有在用戶端嘗試在物件上呼叫方法時執行的動作，或啟動從用戶端物件。This only happens when a client attempts to call a method on the object or activates the object from the client side. 已知物件的詳細說明，請參閱 < [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396)。For a detailed description of well-known objects, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/77ded6e2-4ca8-448b-acf2-562d27fd4396). ## Examples [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/CS/example.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateObjRef2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/VB/example.vb#2)]
